author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Alongside the DC Universe, aka the DCU, Matt Reeves’ The Batman and its spin-off series The Penguin have successfully created their own side story regarding Batman and related characters. One of these characters, Jim Gordon, was played by Jeffrey Wright – though there was some backlash given his ethnicity. Now Jeffrey Wright is throwing shade [...]

The post ‘The Batman’ Star Jeffrey Wright Says Backlash Over His Casting Is “Racist And Stupid” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Batman’ Star Jeffrey Wright Says Backlash Over His Casting Is “Racist And Stupid”

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Netflix once again has subscribers surprised by a new decision. The streaming giant made the announcement that it will be canceling a fan-favorite series after releasing just one season. The news is surprising – as the Netflix series seemed to be performing quite well following the release of its first and last season in June. [...]

The post Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After One Season

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
While it’s expected that streaming services will let go of certain titles as the result of licensing and rights, sometimes it can happen at a disappointing time. This is the case with one of the latest beloved series to be quietly removed by HBO Max, something that stings especially bad knowing that the Halloween season [...]

The post HBO Max Quietly Removes Beloved Series From Streaming Service appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: HBO Max Quietly Removes Beloved Series From Streaming Service
